name: Bunny Ear Cactus
summary: Bunny ears cactus, Opuntia microdasys, originated in Mexico and is a denizen of arid, desert-like areas.
detail: if you have a day, low humidity home and plenty of sunny exposure, bunny ear cactus plant might be the perfect plant for you. Bunny ears forms a 2- to 3- foot tall plant with a spread of 4 to 5 feet in tis native habitat. in the home, it is a slow growing plant that will likly react 2 feet in height and have about the same width.
